name: ILY (itch)
description:
Mushrooms - combine some of the characteristics of plants and animals.  Fungi are present in all ecological niches — in water and on land, in soil and on various other substrates. Ethnobotanist and proponent of psychedelics Terence McKenna, in his book "Food of the gods: the search for the real tree of knowledge", stated that the human erectile evolved into a reasonable person due to an encounter with" magic mushrooms " that contained the psychedelic psilocybin. He called it the stoned monkey hypothesis.  

In the game ILY (I Love You) events occur in the head of the body in a state of sleep! Our task is to solve puzzles created by mushrooms or human consciousness to find answers, we go on a journey through the world of the game. 
 
Feature of game 

The Management Of The Two Mushrooms 

  • Ability to move objects 
  • Keys, switches, and levers 
  • A lot of interesting quests
